author: rcm
msg: Fixed the one to one field so that the remove option is only shown when the view has an object, i.e. it is not shown when it is an EmptyField.

author: rcm
msg: ObjectContent now gets class method if the view contain null as it object reference.  This means that empty fields get class options.

author: rcm
msg: Fixed bug where when a subview specification didn't create a view for an element within a collection, then the adding of the (non-existing) view would fail.  Now if there is no view, then it is not added.
